title: 关于ESS汉化问题
author: 苏梓落末
txt_content:
我在ESS的官网上看到更改某处设置就可以将ess换成中文版本的，可是我设置了之后也没有什么用，想请教一下各位大佬是不是我的姿势有问题。
# Set the locale for all messages.
# If you don't set this, the default locale of the server will be used.
# For example, to set language to English, set locale to en, to use the file "messages_en.properties".
# Don't forget to remove the # in front of the line.
# For more information, visit http://wiki.ess3.net/wiki/Locale
#locale:zh
更改的是这里最后的zh 之前是en

replies.author: 苏梓落末
replies.txt_content: 啊，是我傻了，忘记取消注释符了，各位大佬就当我没有问过

replies.author: qq794195711
replies.txt_content: 去申请关闭帖子，可以退回金粒，提醒你一下。

replies.author: 苏梓落末
replies.txt_content:
Li_Hii 发表于 2019-1-23 11:17
应该是Zh_cn
Chinese: 'zh' for modern Chinese, 'zh_HK' for Hong Kong, and 'zh_TW' for traditional Chinese 请自己翻译一下，拜托，不要误导
